name: Rishiraj Bhattacharyya
content: Dr Rishiraj Bhattacharyya - School of Computer Science - University of Birmingham Dr Rishiraj Bhattacharyya School of Computer ScienceAssistant Professor in Cyber Security Contact details Emailr.bhattacharyya@bham.ac.uk View my research portal AddressUniversity of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT UK Dr Rishiraj Bhattacharyya is an assistant professor in the School of Computer Science. Previously, he held academic positions at the School of Computer Science at NISER, India, and the R. C. Bose Centre for Cryptology and Security at Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata. Prior to that he was a post-doctoral researcher at the ARIC team of ENS-Lyon. He received his PhD from Indian Statistical Institute Kolkata. Rishiraj's primary research area is Theoretical Cryptography. The goal of his research is to build the theoretical foundation of practical cryptosystems.
